Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Xuanse Photography was established in August 2004 and is a fashion photography studio in Shanghai that specializes in high-end private wedding photography, portrait photography, figure photography, and advertising photography services. Positioning itself as a luxury brand, Xuanse focuses on high-end tailor-made wedding shoots. It boasts over ten thousand square meters of luxurious photography facilities, indoor themed photography settings, and abundant outdoor location resources to meet personalized and customized photography needs. The studio offers professional one-on-one service to capture each client's desired precious wedding photos according to their specific requirements.
